alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Talladega and southwestern Calhoun Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grant Town, or near Oxford, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anniston, Oxford, Fort McClellan, Saks, Cobb Town, West End-Cobb Town, Weaver, Munford, Ohatchee, Hobson City, Grant Town, Anniston Regional Airport, Oxford Lake, Blue Mountain, Bynum, Alexandria, Anniston Army Depot, Eastaboga, Camp Mac and Jenifer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
